protein.specific_function: Required for normal Golgi structure and for protein transport from the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) through the Golgi apparatus to the cell surface

reference.reference_text: Duprez E, Tong JH, Derre J, Chen SJ, Berger R, Chen Z, Lanotte M: JEM-1, a novel gene encoding a leucine-zipper nuclear factor upregulated during retinoid-induced maturation of NB4 promyelocytic leukaemia. Oncogene. 1997 Apr 3;14(13):1563-70.
